lead_paragraph: Every sports fan knows to watch the Super Bowl, the Masters and the Summer Olympics. But what about the Arctic Winter Games, the World Snooker Championships and the Futsal World Cup?
snippet: Every sports fan knows to watch the Super Bowl, the Masters and the Summer Olympics. But what about the Arctic Winter Games, the World Snooker Championships and the Futsal World Cup?
